casebody.data:
IN RE FORECLOSURE OF FRISCIA 246P16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016

Mr. Christopher Charles Friscia, Pro Se.

Mr. Nathan J. Taylor, Attorney at Law, For Taylor, Nathan J., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of July 2016 by Petitioner for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."
